metadata.Plot: By a daring ruse and inside help, Pete Rennick, a noted criminal behind bars on federal charges, escapes from the prison, and all of the law-agencies and local police are out to catch him with roadblocks and every car searched, but the escapee gets away. Bill Hasford, a private detective, investigating a racket finds it leads to the wanted man, and has the biggest adventure of his career.
metadata.Writer: Maxwell Shane, Samuel Fuller, William Lively
metadata.Actors: Robert Livingston, June Travis, John Gallaudet
